alert.note: Alert for Animas River Basin; San Juan River Basin; Southwest San Juan Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 3:58PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Archuleta, south central Hinsdale and southeastern La Plata Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 357 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bayfield, or 17 miles east of Durango, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Archuleta, south central Hinsdale and southeastern La Plata Counties. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 160 in Colorado between mile markers 97 and 130. Colorado 151 near mile marker 33. Colorado 172 between mile markers 10 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Animas River Basin; San Juan River Basin; Southwest San Juan Mountains
